items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.crew: Frank Darabont (dir.), Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman
items.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.title: The Godfather
items.crew: Francis Ford Coppola (dir.), Marlon Brando, Al Pacino
items.plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

items.title: The Godfather: Part II
items.crew: Francis Ford Coppola (dir.), Al Pacino, Robert De Niro
items.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

items.title: The Dark Knight
items.crew: Christopher Nolan (dir.), Christian Bale, Heath Ledger
items.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

items.title: 12 Angry Men
items.crew: Sidney Lumet (dir.), Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb
items.plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

items.title: Schindler's List
items.crew: Steven Spielberg (dir.), Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes
items.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
items.fullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
items.crew: Peter Jackson (dir.), Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen
items.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

items.title: Pulp Fiction
items.crew: Quentin Tarantino (dir.), John Travolta, Uma Thurman
items.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

items.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
items.fullTitle: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966)
items.crew: Sergio Leone (dir.), Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach
items.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.fullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
items.crew: Peter Jackson (dir.), Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen
items.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
